title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: The Euganean Hills, Italy
content:
Photo submitted by Simone Roncali, “This picture was taken on Mount Peraro, I love night rides and yesterday’s was magical, I met a fox, a family of wild boars, a beech marten and a badger!” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: The Euganean Hills, Italy appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
